title: [BUG]Chat Spam when Smallest Golems Spawn
body:
Unfortunately I cannot copy+paste what is said when this bug occurs, however in certain games upon the smalles golems (once they have split up as many times as possible) spawn, there is a chat spam of something similar to "loading-aiAggression01", like I said, don't know the exact message but I'll edit it in once I play another game.
This is spammed to everyone's chat, regardless of who gets said golems to spawn.

In this scenario my team was a Teemo, Lee Sin (JG), Taliyah, Ezreal and Zilean.
The enemy team was Renekton, Elise (JG), Zed, Twitch and Janna.


*i know it's in the wrong board, i wasn't able to connect to the report a bug page because of a dns error*

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue has been reported and escalated to the appropriate team(s) to be dealt with.

We do not currently have an ETA on a fix.

Edit: A fix is on the way!
